mapper.select: SELECT a.realm, a.menu_id, a.parent_id,a.menu_type FROM wk_admin_menu as a WHERE menu_id IN ( SELECT menu_id FROM wk_admin_role_menu AS a INNER JOIN wk_admin_user_role as b ON a.role_id = b.role_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} group by a.menu_id )

SELECT count( CASE WHEN find_in_set( #{userId}, admin_user_id ) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END ) AS adminNum , count( CASE WHEN find_in_set( #{userId},member_user_id ) or find_in_set( #{deptId},member_dept_id ) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END ) AS userNum FROM wk_crm_customer_pool WHERE `status` = '1'
